abstract.text: Channel Voice Message: RPN (Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Registered Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Assembles a MIDI 1.0 NRPN compound message, consisting of multiple CC events.

Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
Determines whether a message is an RPN (registered) or an NRPN (assignable).
These messages are available only when using the MIDI 2.0 protocol.

Channel Voice Message: NRPN (Non-Registered Parameter Number),
also referred to as Assignable Controller in MIDI 2.0.
MIDI 2.0 Parameter Number value change type.
Determines whether an RPN/NRPN messages value is absolute or a relative change.
